name: Pitch Black: Audio Pong (itch)
description:
Audio Pong is an exciting audio only take on the classic arcade game pong.

Featuring a 3D binaural setting with some questionable characters, battle your way to the top of the audio food chain or try your luck at the endless mode to set a high score in the community!

To play, move left and right to deflect the puck back at the opponent.
